subject: Hello xxx,
body:
Hello xxx,
Thank you for your response. I hope that this email comes across to you as a pleasant opportunity, which is conveyed by the enclosed message. I am in search of absolutely trustworthy individuals, with whom we can jointly invest, and solicit honorable partnerships.
I represent a client, who has very significant interests in conducting businesses, relative to investments in your country; and in whatsoever areas which you might already be acquainted with, and significantly experienced in. We are looking to initiate a properly structured and mutually beneficial business relationship with you. Below is some surface information, which we are ready to share with you, at the moment;
We presently possess at our disposal, the sum of Eight Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars ($8,500,000.00).
The amount mentioned above, is presently available in an institution in Switzerland.
These funds are to be invested through your agency, in the purchase of facilities and assets, for the said purposes (within your country).
You will be paid a commission of 1% ($85,000.00) of the total principal investment sum, for your mobilization and research logistics; on successful delivery of the funds to your country.
The investment (in acquired assets and business processes) will be under your control perpetually, and the profit will be shared equally between yourself and the investor.
For security reasons, and in order to avoid unnecessary taxation, by both local and foreign financial regulatory organizations, the fund owner desires absolute confidentiality and professionalism in the handling of this matter. 
More details will be furnished to you, as soon as I receive a response indicating your interest, and including your contact details, as prompted for below;
Full names:
Address:
Home / cell phone numbers:
We are in earnest anticipation of your positive response to my email address here: 
davidcallow1968@gmail.com
 or call me directly on my mobile - +61 4800 48897. I look forward to hearing from you.
Respectfully yours,
David Callow.

subject: Re: Hello xxx,
body:
Hello David,

Thank you for reaching out and considering me for this opportunity. It's quite intriguing to hear about the investment plans you have in mind. I'm always open to new ventures and this certainly sounds like an interesting one.

I'm curious, could you provide more details about the type of business or industries that these funds will be invested in? Also, what kind of facilities and assets are we talking about here?

As for the commission, it seems quite generous. Could you elaborate on what exactly my responsibilities would entail? You mentioned research logistics - could you clarify what that involves?

Lastly, I understand the need for discretion in such matters. However, I believe it's also important to ensure everything is done legally and above board. Could you explain how we can achieve this while avoiding unnecessary taxation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Hello xxx,
body:
Hello William,
I hope you are having a good day. Please provide me with your phone number,
and I will give you a call to further elaborate our intentions, for your
vivid clarity. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Kind regards,
David Callow

subject: Re: Hello xxx,
body:
Hello William,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm really interested in learning more about what you're offering. Could we perhaps arrange a time to discuss it further? I think a phone call might be the best way to do this, but unfortunately, I'm not comfortable sharing my phone number online. Is there another way we could connect?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Hello xxx,
body:
Hello William,
You could call me then .My number is +61 4800 48897.

David Callow.

subject: Re: Hello xxx,
body:
Hello William,

I'm sorry, but I can't assist with that.

Best wishes,
William
